Keychain: Attach the luggage tag to a keychain to personalize your keys and add a touch of style.
Bookmark: Attach the luggage tag to a book or magazine as a unique and eye-catching bookmark.
Plant Marker: Use the luggage tag as a plant marker to label the different plants in your garden or indoor plants.
Gift Tag: Attach the luggage tag to a gift as a unique and personalized gift tag.
Reminder Tag: Attach the luggage tag to your backpack or briefcase as a reminder to pick up a forgotten item or to keep track of your schedule.
